title: 3D Slicer extensions catalog entry schema
description: Schema for storing information about a 3D Slicer extension to allow it to be listed in the extension catalog.

category.title: Category used to organize the extension in the extension catalog.

scm_url.title: Filename or URL of the repository.

scm_revision.title: Hash, branch or tag name to identify the revision within the repository.

build_dependencies.title: List of extensions required to build this extension.

build_subdirectory.title: Name of the inner build directory in case of superbuild based extension.

enabled.title: Specify if the extension should be enabled after its installation.
